intent_atoms.description: Implement live streaming of parse events using a concrete StreamingBoxWalker
Refactor ParsePipeline.live() to drive the StreamingBoxWalker instead of previous implementation

functional_units.name: StreamingBoxWalker
functional_units.description: Concrete implementation of a walker that traverses nested boxes in a streaming fashion

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline.live()
functional_units.description: Method that drives the StreamingBoxWalker to emit live streaming events from real walker logic
